alert.note: Alert for Lower Jefferson; Upper Jefferson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 2:23PM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Jefferson County through 300 PM CDT... At 222 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Fannett, or near Hamshire. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hamshire and Fannett. This includes Interstate 10 in Texas between mile markers 843 and 832. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
